meanings.definition: A malignant tumor of lymphoid tissue.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with lymphosarcomata.
meanings.sent2: Lymphosarcomata can be a serious health concern.
meanings.sent3: The lymphosarcomata decided to throw a party in the lymph nodes.
meanings.sent4: Her lymphosarcomata of worry grew heavier with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lymphosarcomata haunted her dreams.

meanings.definition: A cancerous growth originating in lymphatic tissue.
meanings.sent1: Treatment for lymphosarcomata may involve chemotherapy.
meanings.sent2: The biopsy confirmed the presence of lymphosarcomata.
meanings.sent3: The lymphosarcomata tried to sneak into the lymphatic system unnoticed.
meanings.sent4: His lymphosarcomata of doubt spread rapidly through his mind.
meanings.sent5: The shadow of the lymphosarcomata loomed over her health.
